description: Oriana Thomson is a blond english sorceress who works as a mercenary. Her sorcery name is Basis104, from the foundation to carry. Her physical appearance is that of a beauty with a rather attractive figure, which makes most women around her jealous. She first appears during the Academy City Sports festival, for which she was hired by the Vatican for a special mission. She is later hired by Necessarius to help them investigate the source of the Euro Tunnel explosion.
name: Oriana Thomson
